/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. A car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static landscape. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
